pageIntro: Understand your asylum status and what rights come with it.
videoTitle: Quick explanation of asylum status types

refugee.title: Refugee
refugee.desc: You receive full protection and most rights (work, housing, healthcare, family reunification).

dublin.title: Dublin
dublin.desc: You may be transferred to the EU country where you first applied.

rejected.title: Rejected
rejected.desc: Your asylum was denied. Act quickly â€” appeal deadlines are short.
